column4: http://tinyurl.com/28tmt6c Hey Guys, can this netbook run ubuntu smoothly?
I don't really think so... The page says it has an ARM processor. Many applications aren't written for that archetecture. Check it out here: http://www.ubuntu.com/news/arm-linux
Sorry it won't work... You might be able to run a vanilla linux kernel with a really small gfx, but not ubuntu.
The HP mini's run Ubuntu great. Everything worked out of the box for me, it even has really smooth desktop effects. They run about 300USD for a new one. I reccommend it.
